title: godoc css bug on search page
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
If possible, include a link to a program on play.golang.org.
1. Visit http://golang.org/search?q=hex running go1.0.3

What is the expected output?
I would expect the scroll bar to be at the right edge of the page.

What do you see instead?
The page div is 964px wide regardless of window size, and the scroll bar is not attached
to the right side of the page.


Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
N/A

Which operating system are you using?
N/A

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
go1.0.3 at golang.org

Please provide any additional information below.
This happens on Chrome Linux 23.0.1271.17 beta, Chrome Mac 22.0.1229.79  and Safari Mac
6.0.1 (8536.26.14)
